name: MyMorningMantra
0:
”Alexa, Start Morning Mantra”
”Alexa, Begin Morning Mantra”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: morning mantra
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Morning Mantra helps you get motivated and centered for the day. Boost your mood and productivity. Just say "Alexa, begin my morning mantra" to get started with your mantra for the day. You can say "Next Mantra" to get more.


Icon made by [Freepik] from flaticon.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
